Name: Spritzer
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: POUR ingredients into chilled glass and lightly stir. No ice!
Review: To avoid ridicule when diluting a glass of white wine try adding a couple of ice cubes instead.
History: Our Spritz page contains information on the history of, and other recipes for, the Spritz family of cocktails.
Nutrition: One serving of Spritzer contains 68 calories
